Cast on Death.name: Cast on Death
effects: You cannot cast supported Spells directly
100% chance to cast supported Spells on Death

Wrath.name: Wrath
effects: You and nearby allies deal x-y additional Lightning Damage with attacks
x% increased Area of Effect radius
Wrath.description: Casts an aura that adds lightning damage to the attacks of you and your allies.

Ice Nova.name: Ice Nova
Ice Nova.description: A chilling circle of ice expands from the caster.

Item Rarity.name: Item Rarity
Item Rarity.Per 1% Quality: +0.5% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Slain enemies
effects: x% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Slain enemies

Physical Projectile Attack Damage.name: Physical Projectile Attack Damage
effects: x% more Physical Projectile Attack Damage

Molten Strike.name: Molten Strike
Molten Strike.Radius: 20 for main area, 8(?) for magma balls
effects: 60% of physical attack is converted to fire damage
Molten Strike.description: Attacks a target with physical and fire damage, causing balls of molten magma to launch forth from your weapon as you swing. These will explode, causing AoE attack damage to enemies where they land.

Melee Damage on Full Life.name: Melee Damage on Full Life
effects: x% more Melee Physical Damage when on Full Life

Blood Magic.name: Blood Magic
Blood Magic.Per 1% Quality: +0.75% increased Attack Speed when on Low Life+0.75% increased Cast Speed when on Low Life
effects: Spend Life instead of Mana for Supported Skills

Flammability.name: Flammability
Flammability.Per 1% Quality: Burns on Cursed Enemies have +1% increased Duration
effects: Cursed Enemies lose x% Fire Resistance
Cursed enemies have +x% chance to be Ignited by Fire Damage
Flammability.description: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to fire damage and giving fire damage a chance to burn.

Flesh Offering.name: Flesh Offering
effects: Grants Minions x% increased Attack Speed
Grants Minions x% increased Movement Speed
Grants Minions x% increased Cast Speed
Additional 0.5 Second Base Duration per extra Corpse consumed
Flesh Offering.description: Consumes a corpse, temporarily empowering your minions with swiftness (attack, cast and movement speed). The skill consumes other nearby corpses, increasing the duration for each corpse consumed.

Raise Spectre.name: Raise Spectre
effects: Can raise up to 1 Spectre at a time
Minions have x% less Energy Shield
Raise Spectre.description: Raises a spectral version of a defeated foe as a minion to fight for you in battle.

Spell Echo.name: Spell Echo
Spell Echo.description: Supported Spells Repeat an additional time

Vaal Arc.name: Vaal Arc
Vaal Arc.description: An arc of lightning stretches from the caster to a targeted nearby enemy and chains on to many additional targets.

Life Gain on Hit.name: Life Gain on Hit
Life Gain on Hit.Per 1% Quality: +0.5 Life gained for each enemy hit by your Attacks
effects: +(6 to 44) Life gained for each enemy hit by your Attacks

Molten Shell.name: Molten Shell
Molten Shell.Per 1% Quality: +1.5% Chance to Ignite enemies on hit with Fire Damage
effects: Shields break after x Total Damage is prevented
Molten Shell.description: Summons fiery elemental shields providing additional armour for a short duration. If cumulative physical damage prevented by your blocking or armour reaches a threshold, the shields explode outwards, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies.

Shield Charge.name: Shield Charge
effects: (150 to ?)% increased Stun Duration on enemies at Maximum charge distance
(100 to ?)% more Damage at Maximum Charge Distance
Shield Charge.description: Charges at an enemy, bashing it with the character's shield while striking with a melee weapon. This knocks it back and stuns it. Enemies in the way are pushed to the side. Damage and stun are proportional to distance traveled.

Greater Multiple Projectiles.name: Greater Multiple Projectiles
Greater Multiple Projectiles.Per 1% Quality: +0.5% increased Attack Speed+0.5% increased Cast Speed

Puncture.name: Puncture
effects: Bleeding targets take (10 to 29)% of the Physical Damage Dealt per second
Bleeding targets take an additional (50 to 145)% of the Physical Damage Dealt per second while moving
Puncture.description: Punctures the target, causing a bleeding debuff. While bleeding, the target takes damage over time based on how much damage was dealt in the initial hit. The bleeding deals more damage while he moves. Puncture works with bows, daggers, claws or swords.

Grace.name: Grace
effects: You and nearby allies gain x additional Evasion rating
Grace.description: Casts an aura that grants evasion to you and your allies.

Cleave.name: Cleave
effects: When Dual Wielding, Deals 60% of Base Damage from each Weapon combined
Cleave.description: The character swings their weapon  (or both weapons if dual wielding) in an arc towards the target. Also does damage to other nearby monsters. Only works with Axes and Swords.

Knockback.name: Knockback
Knockback.Per 1% Quality: +0.5% chance to Knock enemies Back on hit
effects: x% chance to Knock enemies Back on hit

Critical Weakness.name: Critical Weakness
Critical Weakness.Per 1% Quality: Cursed enemies take +1.5% more extra damage from Critical Strikes
effects: x% increased Area of Effect radius
Cursed enemies have an additional x% Chance to receive a Critical Strike
Cursed enemies take x% more extra damage from Critical Strikes
Critical Weakness.description: Curses all targets in an area, making them more vulnerable to critical strikes.

Vaal Spark.name: Vaal Spark
Vaal Spark.description: Continuously launches unpredictable sparks in all directions that move randomly until they hit an enemy or expire.

Multiple Traps.name: Multiple Traps
effects: Can set up to 3 additional Traps

Arctic Breath.name: Arctic Breath
Arctic Breath.description: Fires a frozen skull projectile that leaves a trail of ground ice behind it. It explodes on impact, creating more ground ice and damaging targets within an area.

Vaal Burning Arrow.name: Vaal Burning Arrow
effects: Gain 60% of Physical Damage as extra Fire Damage
Vaal Burning Arrow.description: Fires an arrow that explodes, dealing fire damage to its target and other nearby enemies, with an increased chance of igniting them.

Enhance.name: Enhance
effects: +X% to Quality of Supported Active Skill Gems

Hatred.name: Hatred
effects: x% increased Area of Effect radius
You and nearby allies add x% of your Physical Damage as Cold Damage
Hatred.description: Casts an aura that increases the cold damage of you and your allies.

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.Per 1% Quality: +1.5% chance to Ignite enemies on hit with Fire Damage
Fireball.description: Unleashes a burning ball of fire towards a target which explodes, damaging nearby foes.

Punishment.name: Punishment
Punishment.Per 1% Quality: Reflects 0.5% of Physical Damage dealt by Cursed Normal EnemiesReflects 0.35% of Physical Damage dealt by Cursed Magic EnemiesReflects 0.2% of Physical Damage dealt by Cursed Rare EnemiesReflects 0.1% of Physical Damage dealt by Cursed Unique Enemies
effects: Reflects x% of Physical Damage dealt by Cursed Normal Enemies
Reflects x% of Physical Damage dealt by Cursed Magic Enemies
Reflects x% of Physical Damage dealt by Cursed Rare Enemies
Reflects x% of Physical Damage dealt by Cursed Unique Enemies
Punishment.description: Curses all targets in an area, causing them to suffer some of the physical damage they deal with their attacks.

Vaal Rain of Arrows.name: Vaal Rain of Arrows
Vaal Rain of Arrows.description: Fires a large number of arrows into the air, to land at the target after a short delay. Enemies hit by the arrows are pinned in place, unable to move for a time.

Vaal Lightning Strike.name: Vaal Lightning Strike
effects: 50% of Physical Damage converted to Lightning Damage
Vaal Lightning Strike.description: Infuses your melee weapon with electrical energies as you swing. In addition to converting some of your physical damage to lightning damage, the stored energy is forced into the enemy as you strike, electrically charging them for a duration, during which lightning will arc between them and other nearby enemies, dealing damaging. This occurs even if the attack is dodged.

Vaal Reave.name: Vaal Reave
effects: 20% more Area of Effect radius for each stage
Vaal Reave.description: Repeatedly attacks a large area in different directions. Each Vaal Reave that hits an enemy increases the area of effect. The area is reset after using another skill or after a short period without hitting anything. Only works with Daggers, Claws, and One-Handed Swords.

Conversion Trap.name: Conversion Trap
effects: Creates a trap which uses this skill when triggered
Conversion Trap.description: Throws a trap that, when triggered by an enemy, converts that enemy to your side for a short duration.

Flame Totem.name: Flame Totem
effects: Summons a Totem which uses this skill
Flame Totem.description: Summons a totem that fires a stream of flame at nearby enemies.

Cold Snap.name: Cold Snap
Cold Snap.Per 1% Quality: +0.5% increased Freeze Duration on enemies  +1% increased Chill Duration on enemies
effects: x% chance to Freeze enemies on hit with Cold Damage
Cold Snap.description: Ice crystals protrude from the ground at target location. Monsters in this area take damage and become frozen. The cooldown can be bypassed by expending a Power Charge.

Temporal Chains.name: Temporal Chains
effects: x% increased Area of Effect radius
Other Buffs and Debuffs on Cursed enemies expire 50% slower
Temporal Chains.description: Curses all targets in an area, making time pass more slowly for them. They will move, attack and cast at a reduced speed, and effects on them will expire more slowly.

Arc.name: Arc
Arc.Per 1% Quality: +0.5% chance to Shock enemy on hit with Lightning Damage
Arc.description: An arc of lightning stretches from the caster to a targeted nearby enemy and chains on to additional targets.

Fire Trap.name: Fire Trap
effects: Creates a Trap which uses this skill when triggered
Fire Trap.description: Throws a trap that explodes when triggered, leaving an area of burning ground that damages enemies who walk through it.

Animate Weapon.name: Animate Weapon
effects: Can use Items requiring up to level x
Minions' Attacks deal x Additional Physical Damage.
Minions have x% increased Attack Speed
Animate Weapon.description: Animates a melee weapon to fight by your side. There's no limit on the number of weapons you can animate.

Endurance Charge on Melee Stun.name: Endurance Charge on Melee Stun
effects: Gain an Endurance Charge if you Stun an Enemy with Melee Damage

Increased Area of Effect.name: Increased Area of Effect
effects: x% increased Area of Effect radius

Anger.name: Anger
effects: x% increased Area of Effect radius
You and nearby allies deal x–y additional Fire Damage with attacks
Anger.description: Casts an aura that adds fire damage to the attacks of you and your allies.

Vaal Clarity.name: Vaal Clarity
effects: x% increased Area of Effect radius
Vaal Clarity.description: Casts a temporary aura that lets you and your allies cast all skills without paying mana costs.

Minion Life.name: Minion Life
effects: Minions have x% increased maximum Life

Lightning Arrow.name: Lightning Arrow
effects: 50% of Physical Damage converted to Lightning Damage
Hits up to 3 additional enemies near the target
Lightning Arrow.description: Fires a charged arrow at the target, causing them to be struck by a bolt of lightning which damages up to 3 nearby enemies.

Lightning Trap.name: Lightning Trap
Lightning Trap.description: Throws a trap that launches a ring of projectiles through the enemy that set it off, dealing lightning damage to them and subsequent targets.

Enduring Cry.name: Enduring Cry
effects: x Endurance Charges granted per one hundred nearby enemies
Enduring Cry.description: Performs a warcry, adding endurance charges proportional to the number of surrounding enemies. Taunts all nearby enemies to attack the caster.

Viper Strike.name: Viper Strike
Viper Strike.Per 1% Quality: +1.5% increased Skill Effect Duration+0.5% increased Attack Speed
effects: Each Viper Strike Charge deals x Chaos Damage per second
Viper Strike.description: Inflicts a debuff on the foe, which deals chaos damage over time and can stack up to four times. Each time it is re-applied, the duration is refreshed. Requires a Claw, Dagger or Sword.

Animate Guardian.name: Animate Guardian
effects: Can use Items requiring up to level X
Minions deal x% increased Physical Damage with Melee Attacks
Animate Guardian.description: Animates a melee weapon or armour, attaching it to an invisible Guardian that fights by your side. Animating multiple items attaches them to the same Guardian. Guardians killed in PvP areas will not lose their items.

Curse On Hit.name: Curse On Hit
effects: Supported Skills have a X% Chance to apply supported Curses on Hit

Vaal Summon Skeletons.name: Vaal Summon Skeletons
effects: Can summon up to x Skeletons at a time
Vaal Summon Skeletons.description: Summons an army of Skeletal Warriors, Archers and Mages, led by a powerful General.

Blood Rage.name: Blood Rage
Blood Rage.Per 1% Quality: +0.2% of Physical Damage from Attacks Leeched back as Life+0.75 increased Attack Speed when on Low Life
effects: x% Increased Attack Speed when on Low Life
x% of Physical Damage from Attacks Leeched back as Life
You lose x% of your Maximum Life per second as Chaos Damage
Gain a Frenzy Charge when you Kill an enemy
Blood Rage.description: Adds a buff that deals Chaos Damage over time, while increasing Attack Speed and Life Leech. Killing an enemy while this buff is active refreshes the buff duration, and grants a Frenzy Charge.

Raise Zombie.name: Raise Zombie
Raise Zombie.Per 1% Quality: +1% increased Minion Movement Speed+1% increased Minion Maximum Life
effects: Can raise up to 3 Zombies at a time
Raise Zombie.description: Raises a zombie minion from a corpse, which will follow you and attack enemies.

Cast On Critical Strike.name: Cast On Critical Strike
effects: Supported Attacks have a (50 to 88)% chance to Cast Supported Spells when you Crit an Enemy
You cannot Cast Supported Spells directly

Vaal Power Siphon.name: Vaal Power Siphon
Vaal Power Siphon.description: Fires your wand simultaneously at all nearby enemies, culling those close to death and granting you a power charge for each.

Glacial Hammer.name: Glacial Hammer
Glacial Hammer.Per 1% Quality: +1% increased Freeze Duration+2% increased Chill Duration
effects: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
x% Chance to Freeze enemies on hit with Cold Damage
Glacial Hammer.description: Hits the enemy, converting some of your physical damage to cold damage. If the enemy is frozen and is on less than one third life, they will shatter when hit with Glacial Hammer. Requires a Mace or Staff.

Vaal Grace.name: Vaal Grace
Vaal Grace.description: Casts a temporary aura that grants you and your allies the ability to dodge attacks and spells.

Summon Raging Spirit.name: Summon Raging Spirit
effects: Can summon up to 50 raging spirits at a time
Summon Raging Spirit.description: Summons a short-lived flaming skull that rushes at nearby enemies and attacks them rapidly. Enemies cannot directly engage these spirits and can pass through them.

Vaal Double Strike.name: Vaal Double Strike
Vaal Double Strike.description: Performs two fast attacks on target enemy with your main hand melee weapon, and summons your double for a duration to continuously attack monsters in this fashion.

Shock Nova.name: Shock Nova
Shock Nova.Per 1% Quality: +1.5% Chance to shock enemies on hit with Lightning Damage+3% increased Shock Duration on enemies
Shock Nova.description: Casts a shocking ring of lightning which deals damage to monsters it touches. Monsters in the centre of the ring receive no damage.

Ethereal Knives.name: Ethereal Knives
Ethereal Knives.description: Fires an arc of knives in front of the caster which deal physical damage.

Convocation.name: Convocation
Convocation.Per 1% Quality: 1% increased Skill Effect Duration  0.5% increased Cast Speed
Convocation.description: Recalls all minions that are following you to your location, and grants them a temporary life regeneration effect.

Cold to Fire.name: Cold to Fire
Cold to Fire.Per 1% Quality: +0.5% increased Fire Damage+0.5% increased Cold Damage
effects: x% of Cold Damage Converted to Fire Damage

Barrage.name: Barrage
Barrage.description: After a short preparation time, you attack repeatedly with a ranged weapon. These attacks have a small randomized spread. Only works with Bows and Wands.

Frenzy.name: Frenzy
Frenzy.Per 1% Quality: +0.35% increased Attack Speed per Frenzy Charge
effects: x% increased Physical Damage per Frenzy Charge
x% increased Attack Speed per Frenzy Charge
Frenzy.description: Performs an attack that gives the character a frenzy charge if it hits. Frenzy charges increase your attack speed.

Discharge.name: Discharge
effects: Deals x–y Lightning Damage per Power Charge
Deals x–y Fire Damage per Endurance Charge
Deals x–y Cold Damage per Frenzy Charge
Discharge.description: Discharge all the character’s charges to deal elemental damage to all nearby monsters.

Vaal Molten Shell.name: Vaal Molten Shell
Vaal Molten Shell.description: Summons fiery elemental shields providing additional armour for a short duration. For each hit you take, the shields cause a burst of flame, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies.

Spell Totem.name: Spell Totem
effects: Summons a Totem which uses this skill
Attacks Cast by Totem have 30% less Cast Speed

Purity of Lightning.name: Purity of Lightning
effects: x% increased Area of Effect radius
You and nearby allies gain +x% to Lightning Resistance
You and nearby allies gain +x% to max. Lightning Resistance
Purity of Lightning.description: Casts an aura that grants lightning resistance to you and your allies.

Elemental Weakness.name: Elemental Weakness
effects: x% increased Area of Effect Radius
Cursed Enemies lose x% Elemental Resistance
Elemental Weakness.description: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to elemental damage.

Vaal Discipline.name: Vaal Discipline
effects: x% increased Area of Effect radius
You and nearby allies gain x additional Energy Shield
Your and nearby allies' energy shield recharge are not delayed by damage
Vaal Discipline.description: Casts a temporary aura that grants energy shield to you and your allies and prevents energy shield recharge being delayed by damage taken.

Reave.name: Reave
effects: 20% more Area of Effect radius for each stage
Reave.description: Attacks a small area in front of you. Each consecutive Reave that hits an enemy increases the area of effect. The Area is reset after a short period without hitting anything. Only works with Daggers, Claws and One Handed Swords.

Burning Arrow.name: Burning Arrow
effects: Gain 30% of Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Burning Arrow.description: Fires an arrow that deals fire damage to its target and has an increased chance of igniting it.

Dominating Blow.name: Dominating Blow
effects: Minons deal x% increased Physical Damage
Dominating Blow.description: Attacks the enemy with a melee strike. If a non-unique enemy is killed shortly after being hit by Dominating Blow, that enemy is revived as a minion until the skill duration ends.

Vaal Spectral Throw.name: Vaal Spectral Throw
Vaal Spectral Throw.description: Throws a spectral copy of your melee weapon. It spirals out in a spinning attack that strikes enemies in its path.

Blind.name: Blind
effects: x% chance to Blind enemies on hit

Vaal Flameblast.name: Vaal Flameblast
effects: 110% more Spell Damage for each stage
Vaal Flameblast.description: Targets an area and builds up a large explosion. The build speed is based on cast speed. The explosion occurs after it reaches 10 stacks.

Melee Splash.name: Melee Splash
effects: (50 to 31)% less Damage to other targets
Single-Target Melee attacks deal Splash Damage to Surrounding Targets
Melee Splash.description: Adds an area of effect splash radius to a single target melee attack.

Projectile Weakness.name: Projectile Weakness
effects: Projectiles have an additional x% chance to Pierce Cursed enemies
Hits on Cursed Enemies have an additional x% chance to Knockback
Cursed Enemies have x% less Evasion against Projectile Attacks
Cursed Enemies take x% increased Damage from Projectiles
Projectile Weakness.description: Curses all targets in an area, making them easier for projectiles to pierce and easier to knock back, while reducing their evasion against projectiles.

Flameblast.name: Flameblast
effects: 110% more Spell Damage for each stage
Flameblast.description: Channels to build up a large explosion. The longer you channel, the larger the area of effect and damage of the explosion. The explosion occurs after using another skill or after a short period without casting.

Dual Strike.name: Dual Strike
Dual Strike.description: Attacks with both weapons, dealing the damage of both in one strike. Dual wield only. Does not work with wands.

Vaal Righteous Fire.name: Vaal Righteous Fire
Vaal Righteous Fire.description: A fiery blast removes your energy shield and all but 1 life, exploding outwards to deal fire damage to nearby enemies based on the life and energy shield lost.

Cast when Stunned.name: Cast when Stunned
effects: You cannot Cast Supported Spells directly
x% chance to Cast Supported Spells when Stunned

Incinerate.name: Incinerate
effects: Adds 100% more Damage for each stage
Incinerate.description: Launches a torrent of fire from your hand. The longer you repeatedly cast the spell from the same location, the larger and more damaging the flames become.

Conductivity.name: Conductivity
Conductivity.Per 1% Quality: Shocks on Cursed Enemies have 1% increased Duration
effects: Cursed Enemies lose x% Lightning Resistance
Cursed Enemies have +x% Chance to be Shocked by Lightning Damage
Conductivity.description: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to lightning damage and giving lightning damage a chance to shock.

Vaal Storm Call.name: Vaal Storm Call
Vaal Storm Call.description: Sets a marker at a location. While the marker remains, lightning strikes random enemies near it, dealing damage to them. After a short duration, a large bolt of lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it. When this happens, it will also set off the lightning at any other markers from this skill.

Ice Spear.name: Ice Spear
effects: x% increased Chill Duration on enemies
Second Form has 600% increased Critical Strike Chance
Ice Spear.description: Launches a shard of ice that pierces close enemies, before exploding on a distant enemy with a much higher critical strike chance.

Vaal Detonate Dead.name: Vaal Detonate Dead
effects: Explosion deals Base Fire Damage equal to 24% of the corpse's maximum Life
Vaal Detonate Dead.description: Explodes an unused corpse, dealing fire and physical damage to nearby enemies. Nearby corpses will also explode in a chain reaction.

Vaal Lightning Trap.name: Vaal Lightning Trap
Vaal Lightning Trap.Keywords: Lightning, Projectile, Trap, Vaal, Spell, Duration
Vaal Lightning Trap.description: Throws a trap that launches a ring of projectiles through the enemy that set it off, dealing lightning damage to them and subsequent targets and leaving a trail of shocking ground.

Freezing Pulse.name: Freezing Pulse
Freezing Pulse.description: An icy projectile which has a chance to freeze enemies it passes through. The projectile fades quickly, reducing damage and freezing chance until it dissipates completely.

Ground Slam.name: Ground Slam
Ground Slam.description: The character slams the ground in front of them with their main hand weapon, creating a wave that travels forward and damages enemies with an increased chance to stun. Only works with Staves or Maces.

Power Charge On Critical.name: Power Charge On Critical
Power Charge On Critical.Per 1% Quality: +1% Chance to Gain a Power Charge on Crit
effects: x% chance to gain a Power Charge on Critical Strike
Power Charge On Critical.description: Critical strikes with the supported skill have a chance of granting you a Power Charge.

Increased Burning Damage.name: Increased Burning Damage

Life Leech.name: Life Leech
effects: x% of Damage Leeched back as Life

Rejuvenation Totem.name: Rejuvenation Totem
effects: Creates a Totem which uses this skill
Rejuvenation Totem.description: Summons a totem that has an aura which regenerates life for you and your nearby allies.

Righteous Fire.name: Righteous Fire
effects: Enemies Burn for 50% of your maximum Life per second as Fire Damage
Enemies Burn for 50% of your maximum Energy Shield per second as Fire Damage
You Burn for 90% of your maximum Life per second as Fire Damage
You Burn for 70% of your maximum Energy Shield per second as Fire Damage
Righteous Fire.description: Engulfs you in magical fire that rapidly burns you and nearby enemies. Your spell damage is substantially increased while under this effect. The effect ends when you have 1 life remaining

Purity of Ice.name: Purity of Ice
effects: x% increased Area of Effect radius
You and nearby allies gain +x% to Cold Resistance
You and nearby allies gain +x% to max. Cold Resistance
Purity of Ice.description: Casts an aura that grants cold resistance to you and your allies.

Split Arrow.name: Split Arrow
Split Arrow.description: Fires multiple arrows at different targets.

Iron Will.name: Iron Will
effects: Strength's damage bonus applies to Spell Damage as well for Supported Skills

Point Blank.name: Point Blank
effects: Projectile attacks deal up to 50% more damage to very close targets, but deal less damage to farther away targets

Determination.name: Determination
effects: x% increased Area of Effect radius
You and nearby allies gain x% more Armour
Determination.description: Casts an aura that grants armour to you and your allies.

Portal.name: Portal
Portal.description: Creates a portal to the current area's town.

Ranged Attack Totem.name: Ranged Attack Totem
effects: Supported Attack Skills cannot be used with Melee Weapons
Summons a Totem which uses this skill
Attacks used by Totem have 30% less Attack Speed

Flicker Strike.name: Flicker Strike
effects: x% increased Attack Speed per Frenzy Charge
Flicker Strike.description: Teleports the character to a nearby monster and attacks it with a melee weapon. If no specific monster is chosen, one is picked at random. The cooldown can be bypassed by expending a Frenzy Charge.

Added Cold Damage.name: Added Cold Damage
effects: x% increased Chill Duration on enemies

Vaal Cyclone.name: Vaal Cyclone
Vaal Cyclone.description: Spin and attack in place, damaging nearby enemies and pulling others towards you.

Frost Wall.name: Frost Wall

Wall will be x units long

effects: Summons a totem which uses this skill
Leeches x Life to you for each corpse consumed
Leeches x Mana to you for each corpse consumed

Vaal Ground Slam.name: Vaal Ground Slam

effects: Places a Remote Mine which uses this Skill when detonated

Power Siphon.name: Power Siphon
Power Siphon.description: Fires your wand, dealing increased damage and granting you a power charge if an enemy is killed by, or soon after, the hit.

Rain of Arrows.name: Rain of Arrows
effects: x% increased Area of Effect radius
Rain of Arrows.description: Fires a large number of arrows into the air, to land at the target after a short delay.

Faster Projectiles.name: Faster Projectiles
Faster Projectiles.Per 1% Quality: +0.5% increased Attack Speed+0.5% increased Cast Speed

Summon Skeletons.name: Summon Skeletons
effects: Can summon up to x Skeletons at a time
Summon Skeletons.description: Summons slow moving skeletal minions that decay over time. Does not require a corpse to be consumed.

Lightning Strike.name: Lightning Strike
effects: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
Lightning Strike.description: Infuses your melee weapon with electrical energies as you swing. In addition to converting some of your physical damage to lightning damage, the stored energy is released from the weapon as projectiles as you strike, flying out behind your target to hit further-away enemies. The Projectiles cannot miss if the melee attack hits its target.

Ice Shot.name: Ice Shot
effects: 40% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Ice Shot.description: Fires an arrow that converts some physical damage to cold on its target and converts all physical damage to cold in a cone behind that target. Creates a patch of ground ice under the target.

Discipline.name: Discipline
effects: x% increased Area of Effect radius
You and nearby allies gain x additional Energy Shield
Discipline.description: Casts an aura that grants Energy Shield to you and your allies.

Vaal Immortal Call.name: Vaal Immortal Call
Vaal Immortal Call.Per 1% Quality: Additional +0.01 seconds Base Duration per Endurance Charge
effects: Additional x seconds Base Duration per Endurance Charge
Vaal Immortal Call.description: Discharges Endurance Charges, making the character unable to die for a short time, proportional to how many endurance charges were expended.

Elemental Proliferation.name: Elemental Proliferation
Elemental Proliferation.Per 1% Quality: +0.5% increased Chill and Freeze duration+0.75% increased Shock and Burn duration
effects: Elemental Status Effects caused by supported Skills spread to other enemies

Poison Arrow.name: Poison Arrow
effects: Gain x% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
Poisoned enemies take (2.4 to x) Base Chaos Damage per second
Poison Arrow.description: Fires an arrow which explodes in a cloud of poison. Enemies in the cloud are poisoned, taking chaos damage over time while inside the cloud. Your arrows themselves also add additional chaos damage.

Leap Slam.name: Leap Slam
effects: x% Chance to Knock enemies Back on hit
Leap Slam.description: Jump into the air, damaging enemies (and knocking back some) with your main hand where you land. Requires an Axe, Mace, Sword or Staff.

Double Strike.name: Double Strike
Double Strike.description: Performs two fast attacks on target enemy with your main hand melee weapon.

Infernal Blow.name: Infernal Blow
effects: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
Explosion deals Base Fire Damage equal to 25% of the corpse's maximum Life
Infernal Blow.description: Hits the enemy, converting some of your physical damage to Fire Damage. If the enemy dies soon after being hit, they will explode, dealing fire damage to nearby enemies. Requires a Sword, Axe, Mace, Staff or Unarmed.

Sweep.name: Sweep
effects: (30 to 39)% chance to Knock enemies Back on Hit
Sweep.description: Swings a staff or a two-handed axe or mace in a circle, knocking back some monsters around the character.

Cyclone.name: Cyclone
Cyclone.description: Initiates a spinning series of attacks as you travel to a target location.

Desecrate.name: Desecrate
effects: Deals x Base Chaos Damage per second
Desecrate.description: Desecrates the ground, summoning corpses and dealing chaos damage to all enemies in the area.

Decoy Totem.name: Decoy Totem
effects: Creates a totem which uses this skill
Decoy Totem.description: Summons a totem that taunts nearby monsters to attack it.

Searing Bond.name: Searing Bond
effects: Summons a Totem which uses this skill
Burning enemies take x Base Fire Damage per second
Searing Bond.description: Summons a totem that casts a beam of fire at you and each other totem you control, dealing burning damage to enemies caught in the beam. Enemies near either end of a beam also suffer burning damage.

Shockwave Totem.name: Shockwave Totem
effects: Creates a Totem which uses this skill
Shockwave Totem.description: Summons a totem that shakes the earth around it, knocking back and damaging nearby enemies.

Immortal Call.name: Immortal Call
Immortal Call.Per 1% Quality: Additional +0.01 seconds Base Duration per Endurance Charge
effects: Additional x seconds Base Duration per Endurance Charge
Immortal Call.description: Discharges Endurance Charges, making the character invulnerable to physical damage for a short time, proportional to how many endurance charges were expended.

Item Quantity.name: Item Quantity
Item Quantity.Per 1% Quality: +0.35% increased Quantity of Items Dropped by Slain enemies
effects: x% increased Quantity of Items Dropped by Slain enemies

Detonate Dead.name: Detonate Dead
effects: Explosion deals Base Fire Damage equal to 18% of the corpse's maximum Life
Detonate Dead.description: Explodes an unused corpse, dealing fire and physical damage to nearby enemies.

Purity of Elements.name: Purity of Elements
effects: x% increased Area of Effect radius
You and nearby allies gain +x% to all Elemental Resistances
Purity of Elements.description: Casts an aura that grants elemental resistances to you and your allies.

Purity of Fire.name: Purity of Fire
effects: x% increased Area of Effect radius
You and nearby allies gain +x% to Fire Resistance
You and nearby allies gain +x% to max. Fire Resistance
Purity of Fire.description: Casts an aura that grants fire resistance to you and your allies.

Empower.name: Empower
effects: +X Level of Supported Active Skill Gems

Minion Speed.name: Minion Speed
effects: Minions have x% increased Movement Speed

Enfeeble.name: Enfeeble
Enfeeble.Per 1% Quality: Cursed enemies have 0.75% reduced Accuracy Rating
effects: x% increased Area of Effect radius
Cursed enemies have x% reduced Accuracy Rating
Cursed enemies have x% reduced Critical Strike Chance
Cursed enemies have x% reduced Critical Strike Multiplier
Cursed enemies deal x% less Damage
Enfeeble.description: Curses all targets in an area, making their attacks less effective.

Vitality.name: Vitality
effects: You and nearby allies regenerate x% Life per second
Vitality.description: Casts an aura that grants life regeneration to you and your allies.

Warlord's Mark.name: Warlord's Mark
Warlord's Mark.Per 1% Quality: Cursed enemies have an additional 1.5% chance to grant an Endurance Charge when slain
effects: (0 to 95)% increased Area of Effect radius
Cursed enemies grant 100% Increased Flask Charges
Cursed enemies grant (3 to 7)% Life Leech to Physical Damage when Attacked
Cursed enemies grant (1 to 3)% Mana Leech to Physical Damage when Attacked
Cursed enemies have a (20 to 30)% chance to grant an Endurance Charge when slain
Warlord's Mark.description: Curses all targets in an area. Attacks on the cursed targets will leech life and mana, and killing them will result in more flask charges and a chance to gain an endurance charge.

Whirling Blades.name: Whirling Blades
Whirling Blades.description: Dive through enemies, dealing weapon damage. Only works with daggers, claws and one handed swords.

Storm Call.name: Storm Call
Storm Call.description: Sets a marker at the target location, after a short duration lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it, when this happens it will also set off the lightning at any other marker you've cast.

Flame Surge.name: Flame Surge
Flame Surge.description: Strikes enemies in front of you with a surge of flame. Burning enemies are dealt more damage.

Minion and Totem Elemental Resistance.name: Minion and Totem Elemental Resistance
Minion and Totem Elemental Resistance.Per 1% Quality: Totems and Minions summoned by Supported Skills have +0.35% Fire, Cold and Lightning Resistance
effects: Totems and Minions summoned by Supported Skills have +x% Fire Resistance
Totems and Minions summoned by Supported Skills have +x% Cold Resistance
Totems and Minions summoned by Supported Skills have +x% Lightning Resistance

Added Fire Damage.name: Added Fire Damage
effects: Gain x% of Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage

Spark.name: Spark
Spark.description: Launches unpredictable sparks that move randomly until they hit an enemy.

Mana Leech.name: Mana Leech
effects: x% of Damage Leeched back as Mana

Tempest Shield.name: Tempest Shield
Tempest Shield.description: Enchants your shield with the power of storms, which lashes out to deal lightning damage to attackers when you block their attacks.

Bone Offering.name: Bone Offering
effects: Grants Minions +x% Chance to Block Attacks
Grants Minions +x% Chance to Block Spells
Additional 0.5 Second Base Duration per extra Corpse consumed
Bone Offering.description: Consumes a corpse, temporarily granting all of your minions the power to block both attacks and spells. The skill consumes other nearby corpses, increasing the duration for each corpse consumed.

Vulnerability.name: Vulnerability
Vulnerability.Per 1% Quality: Cursed enemies take +0.5% increased Physical damage
effects: Cursed enemies have an additional x% chance to be stunned
Cursed enemies have x% reduced Block and Stun Recovery
Cursed enemies have x% increased Energy Shield recharge delay
Cursed enemies have x% reduced Energy Shield regeneration rate
Cursed enemies take x% increased Physical damage
Cursed enemies take 40% increased damage from Damage Over Time effects
x% increased Area of Effect radius
Vulnerability.description: Curses all targets in an area, making them take increased damage from physical attacks and degeneration, and easier to stun. The target's energy shield will regenerate more slowly.

Lightning Warp.name: Lightning Warp
Lightning Warp.description: Casts a delayed teleport to a target destination. When the teleport occurs, lightning damage is dealt to the area around both where the player was and where they teleported to.

Haste.name: Haste
effects: x% increased Area of Effect radius
You and nearby allies gain x% increased Movement Speed
You and nearby allies gain x% increased Attack Speed
You and nearby allies gain x% increased Cast Speed
Haste.description: Casts an aura that increases the attack speed, cast speed, and movement speed of you and your allies.

Trap.name: Trap
Trap.Per 1% Quality: +0.75% increased Trap and Mine Laying Speed
effects: Supported Attack Skills cannot be used with Melee Weapons
Creates a Trap which uses this skill when triggered

Firestorm.name: Firestorm
Firestorm.Per 1% Quality: Reduces the time between each fireball by 0.001s
Firestorm.description: Flaming bolts rain down over the targeted area. They explode when landing, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

Ball Lightning.name: Ball Lightning
Ball Lightning.description: Fires a slow moving projectile that periodically damages enemies in an area around it with bolts of lightning.

Remote Mine.name: Remote Mine
Remote Mine.Per 1% Quality: +0.5% increased Trap and Mine Laying Speed
effects: Supported Attack Skills cannot be used with Melee Weapons
Places a Remote Mine which uses this skill when detonated
Up to 5 Mines can be placed

Vaal Fireball.name: Vaal Fireball
Vaal Fireball.description: Launches a series of fireballs in all directions around the caster.

Arctic Armour.name: Arctic Armour
effects: Additional x Mana drained per second while moving
Arctic Armour.description: Summons an icy shield that protects against physical and fire damage. It drains your mana while active and at a faster rate while you are moving. When you have no mana left, the skill turns off. While active, it leaves a trail of ground ice which lasts for a short duration.

Vaal Cold Snap.name: Vaal Cold Snap
Vaal Cold Snap.description: A sequence of ice crystals erupts from the ground around the caster, damaging enemies and leaving the ground chilled.

Explosive Arrow.name: Explosive Arrow
Explosive Arrow.Per 1% Quality: +1% Chance to Ignite enemies on hit with Fire Damage
effects: Explosion deals x–y Base Fire Damage per Fuse Charge
+2 to Explosion Radius per Fuse Charge
Explosive Arrow.description: Fires an arrow which which acts as a short duration fuse. Applying additional arrows to an enemy extends the duration. When the target dies or the fuses expire, the arrows explode, dealing fire AoE damage to nearby enemies. The AoE radius is proportional to the number of arrows upon death.

Spectral Throw.name: Spectral Throw
Spectral Throw.description: Throws a spectral copy of your melee weapon. It flies out and then returns to you, in a spinning attack that strikes enemies in its path.

Heavy Strike.name: Heavy Strike
Heavy Strike.description: Attacks the enemy with a forceful blow, knocking them back. Requires a Mace, Axe, Sword or Two-Handed Weapon.

Smoke Mine.name: Smoke Mine
effects: Places a Remote Mine which uses this Skill when detonated
Smoke Mine.description: Places a mine that will teleport you to it when detonated. It covers both your escape and arrival with a cloud of smoke that blinds enemies, and gives you a temporary buff to movement speed.

Vaal Lightning Warp.name: Vaal Lightning Warp
Vaal Lightning Warp.Keywords: Lightning, Vaal, Spell, AoE, Duration, Movement
Vaal Lightning Warp.description: Casts a delayed teleport for nearby enemies to a target destination. When the teleport occurs, lightning damage is dealt to the enemies both before and after they teleport.

Culling Strike.name: Culling Strike
Culling Strike.Per 1% Quality: +0.5% increased Attack Speed+0.5% increased Cast Speed
effects: Kills Enemies on 10% Life or less when hit by supported Skills

Frostbite.name: Frostbite
Frostbite.Per 1% Quality: Freezes on Cursed Enemies have +1% increased Duration
effects: Cursed enemies lose x% Cold Resistance
Cursed enemies have +x% chance to be Frozen by Cold Damage
Frostbite.description: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to cold damage and giving cold damage a chance to freeze.

Clarity.name: Clarity
effects: (0 to 40)% increased Area of Effect radius
You and nearby allies regenerate (3.0 to 24.6) Mana per second
Clarity.description: Casts an aura that grants mana regeneration to you and your allies.

Vaal Ice Nova.name: Vaal Ice Nova
effects: Repeats up to 5 times on enemies hit
20% reduced Area of Effect Radius each repeat
Vaal Ice Nova.description: A chilling circle of ice expands from the caster, repeating from every enemy hits.

Elemental Hit.name: Elemental Hit
effects: Can add x–y Base Fire Damage
Can add x–y Base Cold Damage
Can add x–y Base Lightning Damage
Elemental Hit.Keywords: Fire, Cold, Lightning, Attack, Melee, Bow
Elemental Hit.description: A standard attack (with any weapon) that adds damage of a random element.

Multistrike.name: Multistrike
effects: Supported Melee Attacks repeats 2 additional times
Multistrike.description: Causes you to attack quickly three times with a melee attack. New targets are selected for subsequent attacks if available.

Enlighten.name: Enlighten
effects: Increased Experience Gain of Supported Active Skill Gems
